checkConstraints.name: event_actions_action_type_check
checkConstraints.clause: ((action_type)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['goal'::character varying, 'assist'::character varying, 'save'::character varying, 'tackle'::character varying, 'error'::character varying, 'yellow_card'::character varying, 'red_card'::character varying, 'period_start'::character varying, 'period_end'::character varying])::text[]))

checkConstraints.name: team_members_position_check
checkConstraints.clause: (("position")::text = ANY ((ARRAY['gk'::character varying, 'defender'::character varying, 'midfielder'::character varying, 'forward'::character varying, 'line'::character varying])::text[]))
